title: unadhu dhayai enai
sahitya:
unadu dayai enai taangumenRirundEn - maaRaaga maayaa

ulagabandamidE migundaduvE

 

anupallavi



danavanidai yavaniyenumaayaa jaalavalaiyut sikkimaayaa 

(unadu)

 

caraNam



aRivilaac ciRu kuzhaviyaayt teru vadanilE tiripozhudilE

iRaivanEuna daruLvidaiyai yena didayanilanil vidaittaiyE

tuRavuvazhisela vunadu tiruvaDi tudiseyavu maruLvaaNi tandaiyE

kuRaivilaadanin naruLu mennaLavil kunRiyadO ena dannai tandaiyE

(unadu)
